alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 10:58AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Columbia, northeastern Dane and western Dodge Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1056 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Columbus, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sun Prairie, Beaver Dam, Columbus, Marshall, Juneau, Fall River, Burnett, Reeseville, Richwood, Clyman, Lowell, Deansville, East Bristol, Atwater, Danville, South Beaver Dam, Minnesota Junction, and Leipsig. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 102 and 138. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 47 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
